creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: triptych divided into three separate framed images with gray gradated background with thin, white lines etched into the surface and lighter colored patchy areas in gray background: panel a: rising linear structure, with over lapping, intricate lines, encompassing the LLC and moving upwards to the center right edge panel b: white etched lines that form three mounds with grassy, floral and branch-like linear designs; foliage on bottom center, overlapping etched text placed at an angle and upside-down; tree branch in LRQ panel c: complex linear structure with overlapping intricate lines that rise at an angel, beginning in the LRC and moving upwards to center left edge
medium: Pigment print scratched with a razor
title: The Falls 1
